name: jsonjsdb-monorepo
description: A comprehensive client-side relational database solution for static Single Page Applications (SPA). Jsonjsdb enables offline data storage and querying capabilities when running applications on the local file system without requiring server infrastructure.
author: Bassim Matar

scripts.build: cd jsonjsdb && npm run build && cd ../jsonjsdb_editor && npm run build
scripts.install:all: cd jsonjsdb && npm install && cd ../jsonjsdb_editor && npm install
